virtualTable.name: EQP
virtualTable.sql: select t.* from (SELECT A.EQP_ROLE_DIV_CD, (SELECT COM_CD_NM FROM CCO_COM_CD X WHERE X.COM_GRP_CD = 'C00148' AND X.COM_CD = A.EQP_ROLE_DIV_CD) AS EQP_ROLE_DIV_NM -- 장비 타입 ,B.BP_ID, (SELECT X.BP_NM FROM CCO_BP_BAS X WHERE X.BP_ID = B.BP_ID) AS BP_NM -- 제조사 ,A.EQP_MDL_ID, B.EQP_MDL_NM -- 장비모델 ,A.EQP_ID, A.EQP_NM, A.EQP_TID -- 장비ID, 명, TID ,A.CSTR_CD, A.BAR_NO, A.INTG_FCLTS_CD -- 공사코드, 바코드, 통합시설코드 ,A.EQP_STAT_CD, (SELECT COM_CD_NM FROM CCO_COM_CD X WHERE X.COM_CD = A.EQP_STAT_CD AND X.COM_GRP_CD = 'C00027') EQP_STAT_NM -- 장비상태 ,C.TOP_MTSO_ID, (SELECT X.MTSO_NM FROM CM_MTSO_BAS X WHERE X.MTSO_ID = C.TOP_MTSO_ID) TOP_MTSO_NM -- 전송실 ,C.MTSO_ID, C.MTSO_NM -- 국사 FROM TMOWN.CM_EQP_BAS A, CM_EQP_MDL_BAS B, CM_MTSO_BAS C WHERE A.EQP_MDL_ID = B.EQP_MDL_ID AND A.EQP_INSTL_MTSO_ID = C.MTSO_ID AND A.CSTR_CD IS NOT NULL -- 공사코드 있는 경우만 ORDER BY A.EQP_MDL_ID, A.EQP_NM) t
